person.content:

1. The Wallabies (a team or group of people)
2. 34-year-old winger (a specific person)

2. 34-year-old winger
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Sure! Here are the entities that clearly refer to "Person" in the paragraph:

Certainly! Here are the valid entities that refer to "Person" in the paragraph:

| Person |
| --- |
| 34-year-old winger |
